org.gbif.common.messaging

Class ForwardingMessagePublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • org.gbif.common.messaging.ForwardingMessagePublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagePublisher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RateLimitingMessagePublisher

    public class ForwardingMessagePublisher
extends com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
implements MessagePublisher
    A simple object forwarding calls from this object to the delegate object.

    You can extend this class and only override certain methods to add or change behavior.

      void send(Message message)
      Sends a message to the default exchange for this message and uses the routing key calculated from the message.

      Sends a message to the given exchange using the routing key calculated from the message.
      void send(Object message, String exchange, String routingKey)
      Sends a message to the given exchange with the given routing key.

        public void send(Object message,
        String exchange,
        String routingKey)
          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: MessagePublisher
        Sends a message to the given exchange with the given routing key. Tries to reuse a channel and only opens a new one if the old one was closed.
        Specified by:
        send in interface MessagePublisher
        Parameters:
        message - to send. This is being converted into JSON using Jackson
